Subseries III.C. Executive Director Donna Lopiano

Subseries III.C contains records of Donna Lopiano, Executive Director from 1992-2002 and Chief Executive Officer from 2002-2007. Records include correspondence with Trustees, advisors, and donors from Lopiano, minutes and reports from the Board of Trustees, Advisory Board, Executive Committees, and various Ad Hoc Committees, and speeches. Records date 1992-2007.

Donna Lopiano was the WSF Executive Director from 1992-2002 and the Chief Executive Officer from 2002 until her resignation in 2007. Prior to coming to the WSF, Lopiano was the Athletic Director of Women Athletics at the University of Texas. At the WSF, Lopiano developed the Community Awards and Grants program, secured funds that enabled the WSF to award more than $14 million in cash grants and free education curricula, and expanded the WSF endowment to $4 million.
